Hi, I'd like to make a mod request.

A friend and I were recently discussing the possibility of creating whole cities and placing them on different continents, but the biggest limiting factor would be the part count and lag. So while trying to find ways around this i thought that a mod could be created that essentially turned a craft into part of the terrain. It would essentially turn stuff into a immovable, unrecoverable, terrain feature that wouldnt have any parts and couldnt break apart. This would solve lag problems while still retaining the aesthetics of expertly designed building and vehicles. You could create 1 kilometer long runways that didnt have 1000 parts. Basically creating runways like the one at the KSC and island. Similar to the way Kerbal Konstructs allows you to create and place stationary objects but also combined with the welding mod from a while back.

I hope i explained that well enough.

Thanks!

Kerbal Konstructs basically does this, but you use 3D models that are imported and set them at specified areas, they act like the KSC buildings. You can launch from them, but sadly you can't have them be like the KSC, so you can't click on them and go to a custom VAB.

@legoclone09 YEah but im saying a mod that can allow you to freeze current vessels into the terrain. With kerbal Konstructs you have to import models and use a editor and stuff. Im talking combining Kerbal Konstructs and the welding mod form a while back.
